```{r}
library(dplyr)

data <- read.table("../trade//rf/world_TF_comp.csv.gz", 
                header = T, 
                sep = ",",
                nrows = 1191653,
                stringsAsFactors = F,
                colClasses = c("integer", 
                               "integer",
                               "character",
                               "integer",
                               "integer",
                               "numeric",
                               "numeric",
                               "numeric",
                               "integer",
                               "integer"))

data <- data %>%
  rename(hs      = hs_code,
         fcl     = fcl_code,
         qty     = source.orig_qty,
         qty2    = source.other_qty,
         value   = source.value,
         qty.fcl = valid.qty,
         vl.fcl  = valid.value) %>%
  mutate(reporter = factor(reporter),
         partner  = factor(partner),
         hs       = factor(hs),
         fcl      = factor(fcl),
         flow     = factor(flow))

```

```{r}
library(igraph)

g <- data %>%
  select(hs6, fcl) %>%
  graph.data.frame()

```

```{r}
g1 <- data.frame(
  from = c("u", "u", "u", "m", "m", "m", "hs1", "hs2", "hs3"),
  to   = c("hs1", "hs2", "hs3", "hs1", "hs2", "hs3", "f1", "f2", "f3")) %>%
  graph.data.frame()


```
